name: Construct PRO
description: Construct PRO is a sandbox-designer, where you can assemble any structure using metal parts, bolts, and nuts and test its physical behavior.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 550 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 750 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
